{"id":1064019883,"question_id":1542,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"5 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1696163519,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"44 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1064019883/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Consecutive Characters","memory":"16.2 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def maxPower(self, s: str) -> int:\n\n        state = s[0]\n        res = 0\n        tmp = 1\n\n        for i in range(1, len(s)):\n\n            if s[i] == state:\n                tmp += 1\n            else: \n                if tmp > res:\n                    res = tmp\n                state = s[i]\n                tmp = 1\n\n        return max(tmp, res)\n\n            \n\n            \n\n\n        \n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"consecutive-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
